body: So the husband turns out to be gay, pretty conveniently I guess lol. The mc and fmc kinda come off as serial philanderers. Of course she’d never sleep with another man cause then we’d hate her and it would feel like NTR. But he can since this is a harem manga. I gotta say, there’s something about the way their bodies look and pose, but I really like it.
They need to translate this and uncensor it.
20 (+) chapters, countless girls and the only threesome is at chapter 10. At least the other scenes are good.
